<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>NOTES TO THE CONDENSED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS: (Continued)</B>
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(H)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>EFFECTIVE TAX RATE AND UNRECOGNIZED TAX BENEFITS</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&nbsp;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B>&nbsp;</B></TD>
    <TD><B>Effective Tax Rate</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Southern Company&#146;s effective tax rate was 33.3% for the six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2008, as
compared to 31.4% for the same period in 2007. The increase was largely due to the
unavailability of synthetic fuel tax credits in 2008. See Note 5 to the financial
statements of each registrant in Item&nbsp;8 of the Form 10-K for information on the effective
income tax rate. Southern Company recorded net synthetic fuel tax credits for the six
months ended June&nbsp;30, 2008 that are $42&nbsp;million less than the net synthetic fuel tax credits
recorded for the same period in 2007, which resulted in an increase in income tax expense.
The credits are not allowed under IRC Section&nbsp;45K for any production after December&nbsp;31,
2007. The increase in Southern Company&#146;s effective tax rate was partially offset by
decreases in the effective tax rate at all of the other registrants. These decreases were
due to additional allowance for equity funds used during construction (which is not taxable)
recorded by Alabama Power, Georgia Power, and Gulf Power and by an increase in the
production activities deduction.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left"><B>&nbsp;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%"><B>&nbsp;</B></TD>
    <TD><B>Unrecognized Tax Benefits</B></TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>For the first six months of 2008, the total amount of unrecognized tax benefits increased
$142&nbsp;million, resulting in $406&nbsp;million in unrecognized tax benefits as of June&nbsp;30, 2008.
Of the $142&nbsp;million increase, $115&nbsp;million relates to tax positions for which the
deductibility is certain, but some uncertainty exists regarding the timing of the
deductibility. Of the remaining $27&nbsp;million, $24&nbsp;million is for unrecognized tax benefits
at Georgia Power and relates to positions that if recognized would impact Georgia Power&#146;s
and Southern Company&#146;s effective tax rates.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>It is reasonably possible that the amount of the unrecognized benefit with respect to a
majority of Georgia Power&#146;s and Southern Company&#146;s unrecognized tax positions will
significantly increase or decrease within the next 12&nbsp;months. The possible settlement of
the SILO litigation, the Georgia state tax credits litigation, the production activities
deduction, and/or the conclusion or settlement of federal or state audits could impact the
balances significantly. At this time, other than the SILO litigation, an estimate of the
range of reasonably possible outcomes cannot be determined. Southern Company&#146;s unrecognized
tax benefit related to the SILO litigation could decrease by $280&nbsp;million within the next 12
months. However, since the unrecognized tax benefits related to the SILO litigation are
related to timing differences only, the $280&nbsp;million decrease would have no impact on
income.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(I)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>NUCLEAR FUEL DISPOSAL COST LITIGATION</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>See Note 1 to the financial statements of Southern Company, Alabama Power, and Georgia Power
under &#147;Nuclear Fuel Disposal Costs&#148; in Item&nbsp;8 of the Form 10-K for information regarding the
litigation brought by Alabama Power and Georgia Power against the government for breach of
contracts related to the disposal of spent nuclear fuel. In July&nbsp;2007, the U.S. Court of
Federal Claims awarded Georgia Power a total of $30&nbsp;million, based on its ownership
interests, and awarded Alabama Power $17.3&nbsp;million, representing all of the direct costs of
the expansion of spent nuclear fuel storage facilities from 1998 through 2004. In August
2007, the government filed a motion for reconsideration, which was denied in November&nbsp;2007.
On January&nbsp;2, 2008, the government filed a notice of appeal. On February&nbsp;29, 2008, the
government filed a motion to stay the appeal pending the court&#146;s decisions in three other
cases already on appeal. On April&nbsp;1, 2008, the court granted the government&#146;s motion to
stay the appeal. A claim against the government was also filed for damages incurred after
December&nbsp;31, 2004 (the court-mandated cut-off in the original claim), due to the
government&#146;s continuing breach of contract. This claim was filed without including any
dollar amount for recovery of damages. The final outcome of this matter cannot be
determined at this time,</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P align="center" style="font-size: 10pt"><!-- Folio -->145<!-- /Folio -->
</DIV>

<!-- PAGEBREAK -->
<P><HR noshade><P>
<H5 align="left" style="page-break-before:always"><A HREF="#tocpage">Table of Contents</A></H5><P>

<DIV style="font-family: 'Times New Roman',Times,serif">


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt"><TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">



</TABLE>
</DIV>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 12pt"><B>NOTES TO THE CONDENSED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS: (Continued)</B>
</DIV>


<DIV style="margin-top: 6pt">
<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>but no material impact on net income is expected as any damage amounts collected from the
government are expected to be returned to customers.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(J)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>SOUTHERN POWER DEPRECIATION STUDY</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Southern Power revised its depreciation rates in January&nbsp;2008. This change in estimate
arises from changes in useful life assumptions of certain components of plant in service
based on an engineering study completed in the first quarter 2008. Depreciation rates by
generating facility changed from a range of 2.7% to 3.8% to a range of 1.8% to 4.1%. These
changes increased depreciation and reduced net income by $1.3&nbsp;million for the first six
months of 2008. The expected total impact on Southern Power&#146;s net income for 2008 is a
decrease of $2.7&nbsp;million.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">(K)</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>SEGMENT AND RELATED INFORMATION</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="2%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="2%" nowrap align="left">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>Southern Company&#146;s reportable business segments are the sale of electricity in the Southeast
by the traditional operating companies and Southern Power. The &#147;All Other&#148; column includes
parent Southern Company, which does not allocate operating expenses to business segments.
Also, this category includes segments below the quantitative threshold for separate
disclosure. These segments include investments in leveraged lease projects,
telecommunications, and energy-related services. Southern Power&#146;s revenues from sales to
the traditional operating companies were $144&nbsp;million and $277&nbsp;million for the three months
and six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2008, respectively, and $144&nbsp;million and $253&nbsp;million for the
three months and six months ended June&nbsp;30, 2007, respectively. All other intersegment
revenues are not material. Financial data for business segments and products and services
are as follows:</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

previously disclosed in the Form 10-K.

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">In addition, at the annual meeting, shareholders were asked to vote on a number of

<TABLE width="100%" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" style="font-size: 10pt">

<TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>to ratify the appointment of the independent registered public accounting
firm. Vote tabulation for this proposal was 569,959,208 shares for, 3,490,470
shares against, and 8,481,205 shares abstaining. As a result of this vote, the
appointment of the independent registered public accounting firm was ratified.</TD>
</TR>

<TR>
    <TD style="font-size: 6pt">&nbsp;</TD>
</TR><TR valign="top" style="font-size: 10pt; color: #000000; background: transparent">
    <TD width="3%" style="background: transparent">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD width="3%" nowrap align="left"><B>&#149;</B></TD>
    <TD width="1%">&nbsp;</TD>
    <TD>to amend the Southern Company by-laws. Vote tabulation for this proposal was
439,321,507 shares for, 35,944,864 shares against, and 10,512,423 shares
abstaining. Although this proposal received a majority of the votes, its approval
was contingent upon the approval of the next proposal to amend the Certificate of
Incorporation and, therefore, this proposal to amend the by-laws of Southern
Company was not approved.</TD>
</TR>

</TABLE>

<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">All 21,725,000 of the shares of Alabama Power&#146;s common stock outstanding on the record date

</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">In addition, at the annual meeting, shareholders were asked to vote for a proposed
amendment to Alabama Power&#146;s Articles of Incorporation, which would increase the authorized
number of shares of common stock from 25,000,000 shares to 40,000,000 shares. The vote
tabulation was 21,725,000 shares for, 0 shares against, and 0 shares abstaining. None of
the shares of preferred stock or Class&nbsp;A preferred stock were voted. None of the shares of
preference stock were entitled to vote. As a result of this vote, the amendment was
approved.
</DIV>

    <TD align="left" valign="top">George A. Schloegel</TD>

<!-- End Table Body -->
</TABLE>
</DIV>



<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%">All of the 1,121,000 outstanding shares of Mississippi Power&#146;s common stock are owned by
Southern Company and were voted in favor of the nominees for directors. None of the shares
of preferred stock were voted.
</DIV>


<DIV align="left" style="font-size: 10pt; margin-top: 6pt; margin-left: 3%"><B>Southern Power</B>

Southern Power:

<BODY bgcolor="#ffffff" style='font-family:"Times New Roman"'>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:right;'><B>Exhibit 10(b)1</B></p>

<br><br>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B>DEFERRED COMPENSATION PLAN FOR</B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B>OUTSIDE DIRECTORS OF ALABAMA POWER COMPANY</B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>Amended and Restated Effective January 1, 2008</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Break" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>


<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2><b>SECTION 1</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Purpose and Adoption of Plan</font></u></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="175" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.1</font></p> </td>
        <td width="79" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Adoption</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Alabama Power Company previously established the Deferred Compensation Plan for Directors of Alabama Power Company. The Plan was last amended and restated April 26, 2002.  The Plan has been amended from time to time including this good faith amendment and restatement effective January 1, 2008 to comply with Code Section 409A.  Except as otherwise provided herein and consistent with Sections 1.2 and 1.3, the terms of the Plan as in effect prior to the effective date of this Plan shall continue to be applicable to deferrals made pursuant to the Plan prior to January 1, 2008.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="237" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.2</font></p> </td>
        <td width="141" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Pre-2005 Deferrals</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Compensation paid to Directors and deferred under the Plan prior to January 1, 2005 shall be treated by the Company as not subject to Section 409A of the Code and therefore &#147;grandfathered.&#148;  The Account balance (plus earnings thereon) of the &#147;grandfathered&#148; deferrals shall only be subject to the provisions of the Plan in effect prior to January 1, 2005 as set forth in the Schedule of Provisions for Pre-2005 Deferrals attached hereto.  In accordance with transition rules under Section 409A of the Code, Internal Revenue Service Notice 2005-1, and any other applicable guidance from the Department of Treasury, the provisions of the prior Plan are only intended to preserve the rights and features of the &#147;grandfathered&#148; deferrals and are, therefore, not intended to be &#147;materially modified&#148; with respect to any aspect of such rights and features.
Provisions of the prior Plan should be so construed whenever necessary or appropriate.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="273" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>1.3</font></p> </td>
        <td width="177" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>409A Good Faith Period</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>For the period from January 1, 2005 to December 31, 2008, the Plan shall be administered in good faith compliance with Section 409A of the Code.  At a time and in a manner determined by the Committee, Directors shall make timely elections to conform to the Plan&#146;s terms effective on and after January 1, 2008.  Such elections shall be made prior to January 1, 2008 and shall apply to elections to defer Cash Compensation and/or Stock Retainer subject to Section 409A of the Code on and after January 1, 2005.  In particular, such elections shall establish the form and timing of commencement of distribution of amounts in Deferred Compensation Accounts pursuant to a new Distribution Election.  Such elections are intended to meet the transition requirements of Section 409A of the Code, Internal Revenue Service Notice 2005-1 and other related guidance promulgated by the Department of Treasury.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2><b>SECTION 2</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Definitions</font></u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Beneficial Ownership</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means beneficial ownership within the meaning of Rule 13d-3 promulgated under the Exchange Act.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="580" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
   <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.2</font></p> </td>
        <td width="532" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Board</font></u><font size=2>&#148; or &#147;</font><u><font size=2>Board of Directors</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Board of Directors of the Company.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Break" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Business Combination</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means a reorganization, merger or consolidation or sale of Southern with another corporation or an entity treated as a corporation for United States federal income tax purposes.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Cash Compensation</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the annual retainer fees and meeting fees payable to a Director.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="635" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
  <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.5</font></p> </td>
        <td width="587" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Code</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, or any successor statute.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Committee</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Compensation Committee of the Board, or such other committee as may be designated by the Board to be responsible for administering the Plan.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Common Stock</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the common stock of Southern including any shares into which it may be split, subdivided, or combined.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="528" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
  <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.8</font></p> </td>
        <td width="480" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Company</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means Alabama Power Company, or any successor thereto.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="528" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
  <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.9</font></p> </td>
        <td width="480" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Company Change in Control</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the following:</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership of 50% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of the Company; provided, however, that for purposes of this Section 2.9, any acquisition by an Employee, or Group composed entirely of Employees, any qualified pension plan, any publicly held mutual fund or any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation Controlled by Southern shall not constitute a Change in Control;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Consummation of a reorganization, merger or consolidation of the Company (a &#147;Company Business Combination&#148;), in each case, unless, following such Company Business Combination, Southern Controls the corporation surviving or resulting from such Company Business Combination; or </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Consummation of the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to an entity which Southern does not Control.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.10&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Compensation Payment Date</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the date on which compensation, including Cash Compensation, and the Stock Retainer, is payable to a Director or compensation which would otherwise be payable to a Director if an election to defer such compensation had not been made.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.11&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Consummation</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the completion of the final act necessary to complete a transaction as a matter of law, including, but not limited to, any required approvals by the corporation&#146;s shareholders and board of directors, the transfer of legal and beneficial title to securities or assets and the final approval of the transaction by any applicable domestic or foreign governments or agencies.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.12&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Control</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means, in the case of a corporation, Beneficial Ownership of more than 50% of the combined voting power of the corporation&#146;s Voting Securities, or in the case of any other entity, Beneficial Ownership of more than 50% of such entity&#146;s voting equity interests.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.13&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Deferred Cash Trust</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Deferred Cash Compensation Trust for Directors of The Southern Company and its Subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Footer">
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>

        <td width="51" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:108%'><A NAME="PAGENUM"><font size=2>2</font></A></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'></p>
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Break" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.14&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Deferred Compensation Account</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Prime Rate Investment Account, the Phantom Stock Investment Account, the Deferred Stock Account and/or the Stock Dividend Investment Account.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.15&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Deferred Stock Account</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the bookkeeping account established under Section 7.3 on behalf of a Director and includes shares of Common Stock credited thereto to reflect the reinvestment of dividends pursuant to Section 7.3(a)(iii).</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.16&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Deferred Stock Trust</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Deferred Stock Trust for Directors of The Southern Company and its Subsidiaries.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="335" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
  <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.17</font></p> </td>
        <td width="287" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Director</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means a member of the Board.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.18&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Distribution Election</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the designation by a Director of the manner of distribution of the amounts and quantities held in the Director&#146;s Deferred Compensation Accounts upon the director&#146;s termination from the Board pursuant to Section 6.3.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="553" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
  <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.19</font></p> </td>
        <td width="505" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Effective Date</font></u><font size=2>&#148; of the amendment and restatement means January 1, 2008.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Employee</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means an employee of Southern or any of its subsidiaries that are &#147;employing companies&#148; as defined in the Southern Company Deferred Compensation Plan as amended and restated effective January 1, 2005, and as may be amended from time to time.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="539" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
  <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.21</font></p> </td>
        <td width="491" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Exchange Act</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="440" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
  <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.22</font></p> </td>
        <td width="392" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 6.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Funding Change in Control</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means any of the following:</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership (during the 12-month period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person) of 35% or more of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities; provided, however, that for purposes of this subsection (a), the following acquisitions of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities shall not constitute a Funding Change in Control: </font></p>



<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition directly from Southern;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by Southern;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation controlled by Southern; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by a qualified pension plan or publicly held mutual fund;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by an employee of Southern or its subsidiary or affiliate, or Group composed exclusively of such employees; or </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(vi)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any Business Combination which would not otherwise constitute a Funding Change in Control because of the application of clauses (i), (ii) and (iii) of this Section 2.22(a); </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The date a majority of members of the Southern Board is replaced during any 12-month period by directors whose appointment or election is not endorsed by a </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Footer">
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>majority of the members of the Southern Board before the date of the appointment or election; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of a Business Combination, unless, following such Business Combination, all of the following three conditions are met: </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all or substantially all of the individuals and entities who held Beneficial Ownership, respectively, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities immediately prior to such Business Combination beneficially own, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the combined voting power of the Voting Securities of the corporation surviving or resulting from such Business Combination, (including, without limitation, a corporation which as a result of such transaction holds Beneficial Ownership of all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities or all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s assets) (such surviving or resulting corporation to be referred to as &#147;Surviving Company&#148;), in substantially the same proportions as their ownership, immediately prior to such Business Combination, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no Person (excluding any corporation resulting from such Business Combination, any qualified pension plan, publicly held mutual fund, Group composed exclusively of employees or employee benefit plan (or related trust) of Southern, its subsidiaries or Surviving Company) holds Beneficial Ownership, directly or indirectly, of 35% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of Surviving Company except to the extent that such ownership existed prior to the Business Combination; and </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the majority of the members of the board of directors of Surviving Company during the 12-month period following the Business Combination were members of the Southern Board of Directors at the earlier of the date of execution of the initial agreement, or of the action of the Southern Board of Directors, providing for such Business Combination or such members of the board of directors of the Surviving Company are directors whose appointment or election was endorsed by a majority of the members of such Southern Board of Directors.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership (during the 12-month period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person) of 50% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of the Company; provided, however, that for purposes of this Subsection 2.22(d), any acquisition by an employee of Southern or its subsidiary or affiliate, or Group composed entirely of such employees, any qualified pension plan, publicly held mutual fund or any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation Controlled by Southern shall not constitute a Funding Change in Control;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of a reorganization, merger or consolidation of the Company with another corporation (a &#147;Funding Subsidiary Business Combination&#148;), in each case, unless, following such Funding Subsidiary Business Combination, Southern </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Controls the corporation surviving or resulting from such Funding Subsidiary Business Combination, or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to an entity that Southern does not Control; provided, however, that for purposes of this subsection (f) the following sales or dispositions otherwise described herein shall not constitute a Funding Change in Control: </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to Southern or to a shareholder of Southern in exchange for or with respect to such shareholder&#146;s stock of Southern; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the sale of other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to a Person that owns, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the total value or voting power of the outstanding stock of Southern; or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to an entity Controlled by shareholders of Southern that hold, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the total value or voting power of all of the outstanding stock of Southern. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>For purposes of this Section 2.22(f) &#147;all or substantially all of the assets&#148; means at least 80% of the gross value of the assets of the entity immediately before the acquisition.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.23&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Funding Event</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the occurrence of any of the following events as administratively determined by the Southern Committee:</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Southern or the Company has entered into a written agreement, such as, but not limited to, a letter of intent, which, if Consummated, would result in a Funding Change in Control;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Southern, the Company or any other Person publicly announces an intention to take or to consider taking actions which, if Consummated, would result in a Funding Change in Control under circumstances where the Consummation of the announced action or intended action is legally and financially possible;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any Person acquires Beneficial Ownership of fifteen percent (15%) or more of the Common Stock; or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Southern Board or the Company elects to otherwise fund the Deferred Cash Trust and Deferred Stock Trust in accordance with the provisions of Section 9.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.24&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Funding Subsidiary Business Combination</font></u><font size=2>&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Section 2.22(e) hereof.</font></p>

            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Group</font></u><font size=2>&#148; has the meaning set forth in Section 14(d) of the Exchange Act.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.26&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Incumbent Board</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means those individuals who constitute the Southern board of directors as of January 1, 2008, plus any individual who shall become a director subsequent to </font></p>

</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>such date whose election or nomination for election by Southern&#146;s shareholders was approved by a vote of at least 75% of the directors then comprising the Incumbent Board. Notwithstanding the foregoing, no individual who shall become a director of the Southern board of directors subsequent to January 1, 2008, whose initial assumption of office occurs as a result of an actual or threatened election contest (within the meaning of Rule 14a-11 of the regulations promulgated under the Exchange Act) with respect to the election or removal of directors or other actual or threatened solicitation of proxies or consents by or on behalf of a Person other than the Southern board of directors shall be a member of the Incumbent Board.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.27&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Market Value</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the average of the high and low prices of the Common Stock, as published in the Wall Street Journal in its report of New York Stock Exchange composite transactions, on the date such Market Value is to be determined, as specified herein (or the average of the high and low sale prices on the trading day immediately preceding such date if the Common Stock is not traded on the New York Stock Exchange on such date)</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.28&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Modification Delay</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means that the election shall not take effect until twelve (12) months after the date the election is made, the payment which is the subject of the election shall be deferred five (5) years from the date previously elected by the Director, and where applicable in the case of a payment made pursuant to a fixed schedule or specified time, the election must be made at least twelve (12) months prior to the time payment is scheduled to be made.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.29&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Participant</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means a Director or former Director who has an unpaid Deferred Compensation Account balance under the Plan.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.30&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Participating Companies</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means those companies that are affiliated with Southern whose boards of directors have authorized the establishment of trust(s) for the funding of their respective directors&#146; Deferred Compensation Accounts under their respective Deferred Compensation Plans for Directors, including the Company.  </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.31&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Person</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means any individual, entity or group within the meaning of Section 13(d)(3) or 14(d)(2) of the Exchange Act.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.32&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Phantom Stock Investment Account</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the bookkeeping account established pursuant to Section 7.2 in which a Director may elect to defer Cash Compensation or make investments, and includes amounts credited thereto to reflect the reinvestment of dividends.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.33&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Plan</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the Deferred Compensation Plan for Outside Directors of Alabama Power Company as from time to time in effect.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.35&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Preliminary Change in Control</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the occurrence of any of the following as determined by the Southern Committee:</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Southern or the Company has entered into a written agreement, such as, but not limited to, a letter of intent, which, if Consummated, would result in a Southern Change in Control or a Company Change in Control, as the case may be;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Southern, the Company or any Person publicly announces an intention to take or to consider taking actions which, if Consummated, would result in a Southern Change in Control or a Company Change in Control under circumstances where the </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>

    <tr >
        <td width="273" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:108%'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="51" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:108%'><A NAME="PAGENUM"><font size=2>6</font></A></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'></p>
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Break" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Consummation of the announced action or intended action is legally and financially possible;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any Person becomes the Beneficial Owner of fifteen percent (15%) or more of the Common Stock; or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Southern Board of Directors or the Board of Directors of the Company has declared that a Preliminary Change in Control has occurred.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.36&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Prime Interest Rate</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the prime rate of interest as published in the </font><u><font size=2>Wall Street Journal</font></u><font size=2> or its successor on the 1<sup>st</sup> day of the quarter.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.37&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Prime Rate Investment Account</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the bookkeeping account established pursuant to Section 7.1 in which a Director may elect to defer Cash Compensation or make investments, the investment return on which is computed at the Prime Interest Rate.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.38&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Separation from Service</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means a ceasing of the obligation to provide service as a Director.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation controlled by Southern,  </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by a qualified pension plan or publicly held mutual fund,</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by an Employee or Group composed exclusively of Employees, or </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(vi)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any Business Combination which would not otherwise constitute a Change in Control because of the application of clauses (i), (ii) and (iii) of Section 2.41(a) of this Plan; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A change in the composition of Southern&#146;s board of directors whereby individuals who constitute the Incumbent Board cease for any reason to constitute at least a majority of Southern&#146;s board of directors; or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Consummation of a Business Combination, unless, following such Business Combination, all of the following three conditions are met: </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all or substantially all of the individuals and entities who held Beneficial Ownership, respectively, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities immediately prior to such Business Combination beneficially own, directly or indirectly, 65% or more of the combined voting power of the Voting Securities of the corporation surviving or resulting from such Business Combination, (including, without limitation, a corporation which as a result of such transaction holds Beneficial Ownership of all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities or all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s assets) (such surviving or resulting corporation to be referred to as &#147;Surviving Company&#148;), in substantially the same proportions as their ownership, immediately prior to such Business Combination, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no Person (excluding any corporation resulting from such Business Combination, any qualified pension plan, publicly held mutual fund, Group composed exclusively of employees or employee benefit plan (or related trust) of Southern, its subsidiaries, or Surviving Company) holds Beneficial Ownership, directly or indirectly, of 20% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of Surviving Company except to the extent that such ownership existed prior to the Business Combination; and </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;at least a majority of the members of the board of directors of Surviving Company were members of the Incumbent Board at the earlier of the date of execution of the initial agreement, or of the action of the Southern board of directors, providing for such Business Combination.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.42&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Southern Committee</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means a committee comprised of the Chairman of the Southern Board, the Chief Financial Officer of Southern and the General Counsel of Southern.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.43&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Stock Dividend Investment Account</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the bookkeeping account(s) established pursuant to Section 7.4 on behalf of a Director that is credited with shares of stock, other than Common Stock, paid as a dividend to holders of record on shares of Common Stock.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.44&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Stock Retainer</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the annual Board retainer fee that is paid to the Director in the form of Common Stock.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.45&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Transferred Amount</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means an amount (a)&nbsp;equal to the value of a Director&#146;s accounts under the applicable deferred compensation plan for directors of Southern, Georgia Power Company, Gulf Power Company, or Mississippi Power Company and (b)&nbsp;which has been transferred to the Plan in connection with the Director&#146;s transfer from the Southern Board or the board of directors of Georgia Power Company, Gulf Power Company, or Mississippi Power Company.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;2.46&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;</font><u><font size=2>Trust Administrator</font></u><font size=2>&#148; means the individual or committee that is established in the Deferred Stock Trust and the Deferred Cash Trust, to administer such trusts on behalf of the Participating Companies.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>
