<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2><b>SECTION 12</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Amendment, Termination and Effective Date</font></u></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="267" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>12.1</font></p> </td>
        <td width="171" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Amendment of the Plan</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>The Plan may be amended or terminated at any time by the Board of Directors, provided, however, that no such amendment or termination of the Plan shall be effective if such amendment or termination is made or is effective within a period that is (a) six (6) months before, or at any time after, a Preliminary Change in Control and (b) prior to (x) the earlier of such time as the Southern Committee shall have determined that the event that gave rise to such Preliminary Change in Control shall not be Consummated or (y) two years following the respective Change in Control, unless such amendment or termination during such period has the effect of increasing benefits to Participants under the Plan, is determined by the Board of Directors to be immaterial, or applies solely to Directors who, in the case of a Company Change in Control, are not Directors on the date of the respective Preliminary
Change in Control, or, in the case of a Southern Change in Control, are not Directors on the date of the respective Southern Change in Control. Following a Change in Control, nothing in this Section 12.1 shall prevent the Board of Directors from amending or terminating the Plan as to any subsequent Change in Control provided that no such amendment or termination shall impair any rights or reduce any benefits previously accrued under the Plan as a result of a previous Change in Control.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="288" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>12.2</font></p> </td>
        <td width="192" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>No Impairment of Benefits</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Notwithstanding the provisions of Section 12.1 herein, no amendment to or termination of the Plan shall impair any rights to benefits that have accrued hereunder.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="281" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>12.3</font></p> </td>
        <td width="185" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Section 409A of the Code</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>All payments of &#147;non-qualified deferred compensation&#148; (within the meaning of Section 409A of the Code), whether or not expressly designated as such, are intended to comply with the requirements of Section 409A, and shall be interpreted in accordance therewith.  Neither the Participant nor the Company may accelerate any such deferred payment, except in compliance with Section 409A for such events that include but may not be limited to a termination of the Plan.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="216" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>12.4</font></p> </td>
        <td width="120" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Governing Law</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>This Plan shall be construed in accordance with and governed by the laws of the state of the Company to the extent not inconsistent with the requirement of the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974, as amended, and Section 409A of the Code.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Footer">
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="328" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="269" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:108%'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p> </td>
        <td width="59" nowrap valign=top >
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:left;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;line-height:108%'><A NAME="PAGENUM"><font size=2>20</font></A></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><B>SCHEDULE OF PROVISIONS FOR PRE-2005 DEFERRALS</B></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2><b>SECTION 1</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Purpose</font></u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:6pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;1.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</font><u><font size=2>Schedule of Provisions for Pre-2005 Deferrals</font></u><font size=2>: This Schedule sets forth the operative provisions of the Plan applicable to &#147;grandfathered&#148; deferrals of Cash Compensation and Stock Retainer made by Participants which are treated by the Company as not subject to Section 409A of the Code.  The Deferred Compensation Account balance (plus earnings thereon) of the grandfathered deferrals shall only be subject to the provisions set forth in this Schedule.  In accordance with transition rules under Section 409A of the Code, Internal Revenue Service Notice 2005-1, Treasury Regulation Section 1.409A-1 </font><i><font size=2>et seq.</font></i><font size=2>,  or any other applicable guidance from the Department of Treasury, these provisions are only intended t
o preserve the rights and features of the
&#147;grandfathered&#148; deferrals and are, therefore, not intended to &#147;materially modify&#148; any aspect of such rights and features.  Provisions of this Schedule should be so construed whenever necessary or appropriate.  Provisions in this Schedule shall only be amended in accordance with this Schedule&#146;s terms.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2><b>SECTION 2</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Definitions</font></u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.1&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Beneficial Ownership&#148; means beneficial ownership within the meaning of Rule 13d-3 promulgated under the Exchange Act.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="628" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.2</font></p> </td>
        <td width="532" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;Board&#148; or &#147;Board of Directors&#148; means the Board of Directors of the Company.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.3&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Business Combination&#148; means a reorganization, merger or consolidation or sale of Southern with another corporation or an entity treated as a corporation for United States federal income tax purposes.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.4&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Cash Compensation&#148; means the annual retainer fees and meeting fees payable to a Director in cash.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.5&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Code&#148; means the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended, or any successor statute.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.6&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Committee&#148; means the Compensation Committee of the Board, or such other committee as may be designated by the Board to be responsible for administering the Plan and this Schedule.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.7&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Common Stock&#148; means the common stock of Southern, including any shares into which it may be split, subdivided, or combined.</font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="576" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.8</font></p> </td>
        <td width="480" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;Company&#148; means Alabama Power Company, or any successor thereto.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Footer">
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="453" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>2.9</font></p> </td>
        <td width="357" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;Company Change in Control&#148; means the following:</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership of 50% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of the Company; provided, however, that for purposes of this Section 2.9, any acquisition by an Employee, or Group composed entirely of Employees, any qualified pension plan, any publicly held mutual fund or any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation Controlled by Southern shall not constitute a Change in Control;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Consummation of a reorganization, merger or consolidation of the Company (a &#147;Company Business Combination&#148;), in each case, unless, following such Company Business Combination, Southern Controls the corporation surviving or resulting from such Company Business Combination; or </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Consummation of the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to an entity which Southern does not Control.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.10&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Compensation Payment Date&#148; means the date on which compensation, including Cash Compensation, and the Stock Retainer, is payable to a Director or compensation which would otherwise be payable to a Director if an election to defer such compensation had not been made.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.11&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Consummation&#148; means the completion of the final act necessary to complete a transaction as a matter of law, including, but not limited to, any required approvals by the corporation&#146;s shareholders and board of directors, the transfer of legal and beneficial title to securities or assets and the final approval of the transaction by any applicable domestic or foreign governments or agencies.  </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.12&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Control&#148; means, in the case of a corporation, Beneficial Ownership of more than 50% of the combined voting power of the corporation&#146;s Voting Securities, or in the case of any other entity, Beneficial Ownership of more than 50% of such entity&#146;s voting equity interests.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.13&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Deferred Cash Trust&#148; means the Deferred Cash Compensation Trust for Directors of The Southern Company and its Subsidiaries.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.14&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Deferred Compensation Account&#148; means the Prime Rate Investment Account, the Phantom Stock Investment Account, the Deferred Stock Account, and/or the Stock Dividend Investment Account applicable to &#147;grandfathered&#148; deferrals of Cash Compensation and Stock Retainer made by Participants which are treated by the Company as not subject to Section 409A of the Code.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.15&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Deferred Pension Election&#148; means the election by a Director who had a Pension Benefit as of the Termination Date, who made a single one-time election, to credit all his Pension Benefit into (i)&nbsp;the Prime Rate Investment Account or (ii)&nbsp;the Phantom Stock Investment Account in connection with the deferral of receipt of the Director&#146;s Pension Benefit until termination from the Board.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.16&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Deferred Stock Account&#148; means the bookkeeping account established under Section 5.3 of this Schedule on behalf of a Director and includes shares of Common Stock credited thereto to reflect the reinvestment of dividends pursuant to Section 5.3(a)(iii) of this Schedule.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.17&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Deferred Stock Trust&#148; means the Deferred Stock Trust for Directors of The Southern Company and its Subsidiaries.</font></p>

        <td width="287" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;Director&#148; means a member of the Board.</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.19&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Distribution Election&#148; means the designation by a Director of the manner of distribution of the amounts and quantities held in the Director&#146;s Deferred Compensation Accounts upon the director&#146;s termination from the Board pursuant to Section 6.3 of this Schedule.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.20&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Employee&#148; means an employee of Southern or any of its subsidiaries that are &#147;employing companies&#148; as defined in the Southern Company Deferred Compensation Plan as amended and restated effective January 1, 2005, and as may be amended from time to time.</font></p>


<div align=left>

    <tr >

<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="481" style='border-collapse:collapse'>

        <td width="385" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>&#147;Funding Change in Control means any of the following:</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership (during the 12-month period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person) of 35% or more of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities; provided, however, that for purposes of this subsection (a), the following acquisitions of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities shall not constitute a Funding Change in Control: </font></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="495" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
    <tr >
        <td width="144" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(i)</font></p> </td>
        <td width="303" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>any acquisition directly from Southern;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>



<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="427" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="148" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="44" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(ii)</font></p> </td>
        <td width="235" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>any acquisition by Southern;</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation controlled by Southern; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by a qualified pension plan or publicly held mutual fund;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by an employee of Southern or its subsidiary or affiliate, or Group composed exclusively of such employees; or </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(vi)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any Business Combination which would not otherwise constitute a Funding Change in Control because of the application of clauses (i), (ii) and (iii) of this Section 2.22(a); </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The date a majority of members of the Southern Board of Directors is replaced during any 12-month period by directors whose appointment or election is not </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Footer">
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><A NAME="PAGENUM"><font size=2>24</font>
</A></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'></p>
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Break" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>endorsed by a majority of the members of the Southern Board of Directors before the date of the appointment or election; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of a Business Combination, unless, following such Business Combination, all of the following three conditions are met: </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all or substantially all of the individuals and entities who held Beneficial Ownership, respectively, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities immediately prior to such Business Combination beneficially own, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the combined voting power of the Voting Securities of the corporation surviving or resulting from such Business Combination, (including, without limitation, a corporation which as a result of such transaction holds Beneficial Ownership of all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities or all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s assets) (such surviving or resulting corporation to be referred to as &#147;Surviving Company&#148;), in substantially the same proportions as their ownership, immediately prior to such Business Combination, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no Person (excluding any corporation resulting from such Business Combination, any qualified pension plan, publicly held mutual fund, Group composed exclusively of employees or employee benefit plan (or related trust) of Southern, its subsidiaries or Surviving Company) holds Beneficial Ownership, directly or indirectly, of 35% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of Surviving Company except to the extent that such ownership existed prior to the Business Combination; and </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the majority of the members of the board of directors of Surviving Company during the 12-month period following the Business Combination were members of the Southern Board of Directors at the earlier of the date of execution of the initial agreement, or of the action of the Southern Board of Directors, providing for such Business Combination or such members of the board of directors of the Surviving Company are directors whose appointment or election was endorsed by a majority of the members of such Southern Board of Directors.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership (during the 12-month period ending on the date of the most recent acquisition by such Person) of 50% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of the Company; provided, however, that for purposes of this Section 2.22(d), any acquisition by an employee of Southern or its subsidiary or affiliate, or Group composed entirely of such employees, any qualified pension plan, publicly held mutual fund or any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation Controlled by Southern shall not constitute a Funding Change in Control;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(e)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of a reorganization, merger or consolidation of the Company with another corporation (a &#147;Funding Subsidiary Business Combination&#148;), in each case, unless, following such Funding Subsidiary Business Combination, Southern </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Footer">
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><A NAME="PAGENUM"><font size=2>25</font>
</A></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'></p>
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Break" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Controls the corporation surviving or resulting from such Funding Subsidiary Business Combination, or </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(f)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to an entity that Southern does not Control; provided, however, that for purposes of this subsection (f) the following sales or dispositions otherwise described herein shall not constitute a Funding Change in Control: </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to Southern or to a shareholder of Southern in exchange for or with respect to such shareholder&#146;s stock of Southern; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the sale of other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to a Person that owns, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the total value or voting power of the outstanding stock of Southern; or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the sale or other disposition of all or substantially all of the assets of the Company to an entity Controlled by shareholders of Southern that hold, directly or indirectly, 50% or more of the total value or voting power of all of the outstanding stock of Southern. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>For purposes of this Section 2.22(f) &#147;all or substantially all of the assets&#148; means at least 80% of the gross value of the assets of the entity immediately before the acquisition. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.23&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Funding Event&#148; shall mean the occurrence of any of the following events as administratively determined by the Southern Committee:</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Southern or the Company has entered into a written agreement, such as, but not limited to, a letter of intent, which, if Consummated, would result in a Funding Change in Control;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Southern, the Company or any other Person publicly announces an intention to take or to consider taking actions which, if Consummated, would result in a Funding Change in Control under circumstances where the Consummation of the announced action or intended action is legally and financially possible;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any Person acquires Beneficial Ownership of fifteen percent (15%) or more of the Common Stock; or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Southern Board of Directors or the board of directors of the Company elects to otherwise fund the Deferred Cash Trust and Deferred Stock Trust in accordance with the provisions of Section 7 of this Schedule.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.24&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Funding Subsidiary Business Combination&#148; shall have the meaning set forth in Section 2.22(e) hereof.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.26&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Incumbent Board&#148; means those individuals who constitute the Southern board of directors as of January 1, 2008, plus any individual who shall become a director subsequent to such date whose election or nomination for election by Southern&#146;s shareholders was approved by a vote of at least 75% of the directors then comprising the Incumbent Board. Notwithstanding the foregoing, no individual who shall become a director of the Southern board of directors subsequent to January 1, 2008, whose initial assumption of office occurs as a result of an actual or threatened election contest (within the meaning of Rule 14a-11 of the regulations promulgated under the Exchange Act) with respect to the election or removal of directors or other actual or threatened solicitation of proxies or consents by or on behalf of a Person other than the Southern board
of directors shall be a member of the Incumbent Board.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.27&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Market Value&#148; means the average of the high and low prices of the Common Stock, as published in the Wall Street Journal in its report of New York Stock Exchange composite transactions, on the date such Market Value is to be determined, as specified herein (or the average of the high and low sale prices on the trading day immediately preceding such date if the Common Stock is not traded on the New York Stock Exchange on such date).</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.28&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Participant&#148; means a Director or former Director who has an unpaid Deferred Compensation Account balance under this Schedule.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.29&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Participating Companies&#148; means those companies that are affiliated with Southern whose boards of directors have authorized the establishment of trust(s) for the funding of their respective directors&#146; Deferred Compensation Accounts under their respective Deferred Compensation Plans for Directors, including the Plan as maintained by the Company for its Directors.  </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.30&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Pension Benefit&#148; means the U.S. dollar amount of the actuarially-determined present value of benefits based on a Director&#146;s expected service at the required retirement date under The Southern Company Outside Directors Pension Plan, as calculated as of the Termination Date, plus accrued earnings on such amount calculated as if invested at the Prime Interest Rate from the Termination Date, until such amount is invested in Deferred Compensation Accounts.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.31&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Pension Benefit Investment Date&#148; means the date to be determined by the Committee, as of which the Director&#146;s Pension Benefit will be credited to a Deferred Compensation Account in accordance with the director&#146;s Deferred Pension Election.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.32&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Person&#148; means any individual, entity or group within the meaning of Section 13(d)(3) or 14(d)(2) of the Exchange Act. </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.33&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Phantom Stock Investment Account&#148; means the bookkeeping account established pursuant to Section 5.2 of this Schedule in which a Director may elect to defer Cash Compensation or make investments, and includes amounts credited thereto to reflect the reinvestment of dividends.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.34&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Plan&#148; means the Deferred Compensation Plan for Outside Directors of Alabama Power Company as from time to time in effect.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.36&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Preliminary Change in Control&#148; means the occurrence of any of the following as determined by the Southern Committee:</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Southern or the Company has entered into a written agreement, such as, but not limited to, a letter of intent, which, if Consummated, would result in a Southern Change in Control or a Company Change in Control, as the case may be;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Southern, the Company or any Person publicly announces an intention to take or to consider taking actions which, if Consummated, would result in a Southern Change in Control or a Company Change in Control under circumstances where the Consummation of the announced action or intended action is legally and financially possible;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Any Person becomes the Beneficial Owner of fifteen percent (15%) or more of the Common Stock; or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(d)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Southern board of directors or the board of directors of the Company has declared that a Preliminary Change in Control has occurred.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.37&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Prime Interest Rate&#148; means the prime rate of interest as published in the </font><u><font size=2>Wall Street Journal</font></u><font size=2>, or its successor on the 1<sup>st</sup> day of each quarter.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.38&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Prime Rate Investment Account&#148; means the bookkeeping account established pursuant to Section 5.1 of this Schedule in which a Director may elect to defer Cash Compensation or make investments, the investment return on which is computed at the Prime Interest Rate.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (a)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;The Consummation of an acquisition by any Person of Beneficial Ownership of 20% or more of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities; provided, however, that for purposes of this subsection (a), the following acquisitions of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities shall not constitute a Change in Control: </font></p>


<div align=left>

<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="395" style='border-collapse:collapse; '>
    <tr >
        <td width="148" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>

        <td width="44" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>(ii)</font></p> </td>
        <td width="203" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>any acquisition by Southern,</font></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2> (iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by any employee benefit plan (or related trust) sponsored or maintained by Southern or any corporation controlled by Southern,  </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iv)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by a qualified pension plan or publicly held mutual fund,</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Footer">
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><A NAME="PAGENUM"><font size=2>28</font>
</A></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'></p>
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Break" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(v)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any acquisition by an Employee or Group composed exclusively of Employees, or </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(vi)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any Business Combination which would not otherwise constitute a Change in Control because of the application of clauses (i), (ii) and (iii) of Section 2.40(a) of this Schedule; </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(b)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;A change in the composition of Southern&#146;s board of directors whereby individuals who constitute the Incumbent Board cease for any reason to constitute at least a majority of Southern&#146;s board of directors; or</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:0.5in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(c)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Consummation of a Business Combination, unless, following such Business Combination, all of the following three conditions are met: </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(i)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all or substantially all of the individuals and entities who held Beneficial Ownership, respectively, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities immediately prior to such Business Combination beneficially own, directly or indirectly, 65% or more of the combined voting power of the Voting Securities of the corporation surviving or resulting from such Business Combination, (including, without limitation, a corporation which as a result of such transaction holds Beneficial Ownership of all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities or all or substantially all of Southern&#146;s assets) (such surviving or resulting corporation to be referred to as &#147;Surviving Company&#148;), in substantially the same proportions as their ownership, immediately prior to such Business Combination, of Southern&#146;s Voting Securities;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(ii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;no Person (excluding any corporation resulting from such Business Combination, any qualified pension plan, publicly held mutual fund, Group composed exclusively of employees or employee benefit plan (or related trust) of Southern, its subsidiaries, or Surviving Company) holds Beneficial Ownership, directly or indirectly, of 20% or more of the combined voting power of the then outstanding Voting Securities of Surviving Company except to the extent that such ownership existed prior to the Business Combination; and </font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; margin-left:1in; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>(iii)&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;at least a majority of the members of the board of directors of Board were members of the Incumbent Board at the earlier of the date of execution of the initial agreement, or of the action of the Southern board of directors, providing for such Business Combination.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.41&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Southern Committee&#148; means a committee comprised of the Chairman of the Southern Board, the Chief Financial Officer of Southern, and the General Counsel of Southern.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.42&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Stock Dividend Investment Account&#148; means the bookkeeping account(s) established pursuant to Section 5.4 of this Schedule on behalf of a Director that is credited with shares of stock, other than Common Stock, paid as a dividend on shares of Common Stock.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.43&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Stock Retainer&#148; means the annual Board retainer fee that is paid to the Director in the form of Common Stock.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Footer">
<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font SIZE=2></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><A NAME="PAGENUM"><font size=2>29</font>
</A></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'></p>
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<div TITLE="EE+ Page Break" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">

<HR noshade align="center" width="100%" size="2">
</DIV>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.44&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Termination Date&#148; means January 1, 1997, the date as of which The Southern Company Outside Directors Pension Plan was effectively terminated.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.45&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Trust Administrator&#148; means the individual or committee that is established in the Deferred Stock Trust and the Deferred Cash Trust, to administer such trusts on behalf of the Participating Companies.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>2.46&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&#147;Voting Securities&#148; means the outstanding voting securities of a corporation entitling the holder thereof to vote generally in the election of such corporation&#146;s directors.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>Where the context requires, words in the masculine gender shall include the feminine gender, words in the singular shall include the plural, and words in the plural shall include the singular.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2><b>SECTION 3</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Eligibility</font></u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>For so long as a Director has a Deferred Compensation Account balance governed by this Schedule, he or she shall be a Participant in the Plan for purposes of this Schedule, and such Deferred Compensation Account balance shall be maintained and administered solely in accordance with the terms of this Schedule.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2><b>SECTION 4</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Plan Periods</font></u></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>No new deferral elections may be made which are subject to this Schedule.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2><b>SECTION 5</b></font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:center;'><u><font size=2>Accounts</font></u></p>


<div align=left>

<table border="0" cellspacing=0 cellpadding=0 width="320" style='border-collapse:collapse'>
    <tr >
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:12pt'><font size=1>&nbsp;</font></p>  </td>
        <td width="48" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><font size=2>5.1</font></p> </td>
        <td width="224" nowrap valign=top style='padding:0in 0in 12.0pt 0in; '>
            <p style='margin-left:0pt;text-indent:0pt;text-align:justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt'><u><font size=2>Prime Rate Investment Account</font></u></p> </td> </tr></table>
</div>

<p style=' margin-bottom:12pt; margin-top:0pt; text-indent:0.5in;text-align:justify;'><font size=2>A Prime Rate Investment Account shall be established for each Director electing deferral of Cash Compensation for investment at the Prime Interest Rate.  The amount directed by the Director to such account shall be credited to it as of the Pension Benefit Investment Date or  Compensation Payment Date, as applicable, and credited thereafter with interest computed using the Prime Interest Rate.  Interest shall be computed from the date such compensation is credited to the account and compounded quarterly at the end of each calendar quarter.  The Prime Interest Rate in effect on the first day of a calendar quarter shall be deemed the Prime Interest Rate in effect for that entire quarter.  Interest shall accrue and compound on any balance until the amount credited to the account is fully distributed.</font></p>

<p style=' margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt;text-align:left;'><font size=2>&nbsp;</font></p>
